subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets got 10 points from Brook Lopez in the fourth quarter, but it was not enough to come back against the Bulls, who took a 2-1 lead in their first-round playoff series.
snippet: The Nets got 10 points from Brook Lopez in the fourth quarter, but it was not enough to come back against the Bulls, who took a 2-1 lead in their first-round playoff series.
